# Government Tender Announcement
## Supply, Installation, and Commissioning of a CNC Press Brake

### Tender Details
**Title:** Supply, Installation, Commissioning and Training for a CNC Press Brake
**Reference Number:** cb-781-52155928
**Publication Date:** 2023-11-17
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-12T14:00:00 (closed)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-18
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

### Business Opportunity Overview
The National Research Council of Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a tender for the supply, installation, and commissioning of a Computer Numerically Controlled (CNC) Press Brake. This project involves the delivery of a metal bending machine to our Rosser, MB location for use in various applications.

### Key Requirements
* Supply, installation, and commissioning of a CNC Press Brake
* Training for staff on the safe operation and maintenance of the equipment
* Delivery and installation to be completed within a specific timeframe

### Trade Agreements and Canada-wide Offer
This tender is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers are eligible to submit bids regardless of location.

### Contact Information
Carol Cooper
Email: [carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
Phone: (902) 293-8053

### Tender Documentation
All tender documentation, including the Request for Proposal, Non-Disclosure Agreement, and Question and Answer documents, are available on the Canada Buys and Sells website. Suppliers are responsible for verifying the accuracy of the supplied documents.

### Notice Type and Method of Procurement
This is a Request for Proposal with Competition – Open Bidding. Suppliers may submit their proposals in either English or French.

### Selection Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Suppliers must provide a detailed breakdown of their pricing and meeting the specifications outlined in the tender documentation.
